input.content: Solve the following questions. Answer with either a single whole number or a simple fraction. If units are used in the question, make sure the answer is in the same units used in the question, though do not include the units in the answer. Do not include additional text or explanation in your answer. You are a helpful assistant.

Sarah has 23 apples, and she wants to divide them among her 5 friends such that each will get an equal amount of apples and she gets to keep twice as many as she hands out to each friend. How many apples are left over?
